short_summary: Ongoing project. Please disregard the Ariba Discovery automatic posting 2pm Closing:
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Title
* English: 5A044-225252 - X-ray Ambient Experience System
* French: 5A044-225252 - Système d'expérience ambiante à rayons X

## Tender Information
* Reference Number: WS3908478702-Doc3915902810
* Solicitation Number: WS3908478702
* Publication Date: 2023-05-30
* Tender Closing Date: 2023-07-04T14:00:00 (EDT)
* Amendment Date: 2023-06-20
* Expected Contract Start Date: 2023-07-20
* Expected Contract End Date: Not Specified
* Tender Status: *Cancelled*

## Description of Requirement
The Department of Indigenous Services (ISC) requires the supply, delivery, and installation of one X-ray Ambient Experience System for the Norway House Hospital in Manitoba, including any required supplemental items.

## Essential Information
* Procurement Category: *GD
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open bidding
* Trade Agreements: *Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Regions of Delivery: *Manitoba
* Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Contact Information: Tanya Gostev (SPAC/PSPC)

## Important Notice
* Please note that the tender closing time has been modified to 2:00pm EDT on 2023-07-04. All bid submissions must be received by this time; submissions after this time will be declared non-responsive.

## Points of Contact
* To obtain more information or clarification on this tender opportunity, please contact:
	+ Tanya Gostev (SPAC/PSPC) via email: [tanya.gostev@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:tanya.gostev@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
	+ Ariba Discovery: www.discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15692494

**Note**: The tender description, amendment details, and points of contact are extracts from the original document. It is recommended that interested parties review the original document for a comprehensive understanding of the tender opportunity. 

I have kept the rewritten entry as short as possible while ensuring that the essential details and information from the original text are clearly communicated. Please let me know if I can make any adjustments for you!  I also used asterisks (`*`) to denote headings and
